name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software quality assurance and full stack development. Proficient in E2E testing using **Playwright**, **TypeScript**, and various testing tools, ensuring high-quality deliverables through rigorous testing methodologies. Skilled in managing CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions**, **GitLab CI**, and **Jenkins**, while employing **Agile** and **Scrum** practices to enhance team collaboration and efficiency.
Experienced in developing and testing **REST APIs** and using tools like **Postman** for automated testing, as well as leveraging **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases to validate application data integrity.
Background in full stack development with **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and strong hands-on expertise in frontend frameworks like **React**, **Angular**, **Next.js**, and backend technologies including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Knowledgeable in compliance-driven development standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring adherence to industry regulations. Proven ability to integrate AI testing tools for enhanced performance validation.
